title: What Really Happened Radio Show Michael Rivero Friday August 8 2
description:
Richard Gage - Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth --

The What Really Happened radio show is now on the Genesis Communications Network!! 

Michael's new time slot is 3PM to 6PM Central time Monday through Friday on GCN 2. (Two hours later than RBN) You can listen live at GCN's live stream page. The call-in number is 877-300-7645. The Bambuser video feed will continue!
-- Donate to Michael @ http://whatreallyhappened.com/ - private
-- Date: 08/08/2014 --
Michael Rivero is the webmaster of http://whatreallyhappened.com/ - private and host of the What Really Happened radio shows on the Republic Broadcasting Network. Formerly with NASA, Michael transitioned his image processing skills (along with a brief stint as an actor) into the then-new motion picture computer animation field and has worked on films such as "Star Trek", "The Day After Tomorrow", and has supervised visual effects on "Brainscan," "LOST", and "Hawaii Five-0." Michael has taken a sabbatical from film work to focus all his efforts on peace activism. Michaels foray into blogging began before the word was even invented, and happened almost by accident when he spotted a suspicious photograph being broadcast on ABC news in 1994 related to the death of White House deputy Council Vincent Foster. Since that sudden beginning, Michaels website has expanded to cover diverse topics including the JFK assassination, the accidental shoot-down of TWA 800, election fraud, health issues, Saddams non-existent nuclear weapons, 9-11, the economy, and of course, the lies used to trick the United States into wars of conquest on Afghanistan, Iraq, and now Iran. Michael resides in Hawaii with his wife Claire, who is a composer and creates much of theme music used on the What Really Happened radio show.
